description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Mystères du Grand Monde: histoires des palais, résidences royales, prisons d'état ... renfermant les principaux événements qui s'y sont accomplis ... They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
